name: Lost In Island (itch)
description:
Experience the ambience of island in this game. Play your character and try to escape from island. There is something wrong in island so try to find them.

Game is based on first person controller. Move your character, walk around and discover the island. Try to find something that can help you to escape.

How to Play:

Use WASD to walk around and use your mouse to turn around. To interact objects, press E key.

Minimum System Requirements (for 720p@30fps):

  • Intel Core Quad or equivalent
  • 4gb Ram
  • Amd hd 5500 series gpu
  • 1gb vRam
  • Windows OS
  • 300mb disc space

Full Gameplay:


Additional Information:

Trees was made with MTree generator. Terrain was created with microsplat node generator. And water was taken from Unity Urp Boat Attack Water System. Some of textures was taken from real life and other 3D models made by myself in 3 days for a game jam.

NOTE: At the end, if you reach to boat, game should be end. But, because of unity's timeline system, it doesn't work properly.
